class.name: CVImgCodecs
class.description: Used to read and write image files. [url=https://docs.opencv.org/4.x/d4/da8/group__imgcodecs.html]More information here[/url].

method.name: imread
method.description: Returns a mat with the image at the specified path. See CVConsts.ImreadModes for configuration options. [u]Additional parameters:[/u] flags: Int

method.name: imwrite
method.description: Saves an image to a specified file. [u]Additional parameters:[/u] params: Array
